actions.description: The spider makes two Ruinous Bite attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Web.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage and 9 (2d8) acid damage. In addition, if the target is a creature wearing nonmagical armor, the armor takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an Armor Class of 10 is destroyed.
actions.name: Ruinous Bite

actions.description: 7 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. Hit: The target has the restrained condition. As an action, a restrained target can make a DC 13 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a successful check. The webbing can also be destroyed (AC 10; 5 hit points; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to acid, bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).
actions.name: Web (Recharge 5-6)

specialTraits.description: Any nonmagical weapon that hits the spider corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits the spider is destroyed after dealing damage.
specialTraits.name: Ruinous Acid

specialTraits.description: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
specialTraits.name: Spider Climb

specialTraits.description: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.
specialTraits.name: Web Sense

specialTraits.description: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.
specialTraits.name: Web Walker
